text: From Aroer on the edge of the Wadi Arnon and from the town in the wadi itself, as far as Gilead, no city was too well fortified for us. All of them the LORD, our God, gave over to us.
Then whoever is left of your family will grovel before him for a piece of silver or a loaf of bread, saying: Please assign me a priestly function, that I may have a crust of bread to eat.”
Then the king summoned Shimei and said to him: “Build yourself a house in Jerusalem and stay there. Do not go anywhere else.
Attai became the father of Nathan. Nathan became the father of Zabad.
The priests: descendants of Jedaiah, of the house of Jeshua, nine hundred and seventy-three;
But they did not retaliate; they neither threw stones, nor blocked up their secret refuges.
How frivolous you have become in changing your course! By Egypt you will be shamed, just as you were shamed by Assyria.
“This was the dream; the interpretation we shall also give in the king’s presence.
There was also a prophetess, Anna, the daughter of Phanuel, of the tribe of Asher. She was advanced in years, having lived seven years with her husband after her marriage,
Therefore let the whole house of Israel know for certain that God has made him both Lord and Messiah, this Jesus whom you crucified.”
